title: Learn Express.js
content: Created my first REST API with Express and MongoDB.

title: JavaScript Array Methods
content: Practiced push, pop, shift, unshift, map, filter, and reduce methods today.

title: MongoDB Indexing
content: Read about how to create and use indexes in MongoDB for faster query performance.

title: React Props and State
content: Learned the difference between props and state in React components.

title: Node.js File System
content: Explored fs module for reading and writing files in Node.js.

title: Async/Await Practice
content: Converted callback-based functions into async/await syntax for cleaner code.

title: CSS Flexbox
content: Used flexbox to design a responsive navbar.

title: Authentication with JWT
content: Implemented login and signup API with JWT authentication.

title: Git Branching
content: Practiced creating new branches, merging, and resolving conflicts in Git.

title: API Testing with Postman
content: Tested CRUD operations of my Notes API in Postman.

title: TypeScript Basics
content: Explored type annotations, interfaces, and functions in TypeScript.

title: CSS Grid
content: Designed a photo gallery layout using CSS Grid.

title: MongoDB Aggregation
content: Learned about $match, $group, and $sort in aggregation pipelines.

title: Express Middleware
content: Created custom middleware for logging requests in my Express app.

title: Error Handling in APIs
content: Implemented centralized error handling in Express using middleware.
